mapper.select: select PATNT_NO, PATNT_NM, PATNT_RRNO1, PATNT_RRNO2, PATNT_TELNO, PATNT_ZIP, PATNT_ADRES1, PATNT_ADRES2, PATNT_AGE, PATNT_SEXDSTN, PRTCTOR_NM, PRTCTOR_TELNO, PATNT_AGRE, PATNT_HEIGHT, PATNT_BDWGH, PATNT_BDP, PATNT_HLTHINS_AT, PATNT_MEMO, PATNT_HSPTLZ_AT from patient order by PATNT_NO desc

select PATNT_NO, PATNT_NM, PATNT_RRNO1, PATNT_RRNO2, PATNT_TELNO, PATNT_ZIP, PATNT_ADRES1, PATNT_ADRES2, PATNT_AGE, PATNT_SEXDSTN, PRTCTOR_NM, PRTCTOR_TELNO, PATNT_AGRE, PATNT_HEIGHT, PATNT_BDWGH, PATNT_BDP, PATNT_HLTHINS_AT, PATNT_MEMO, PATNT_HSPTLZ_AT from patient where PATNT_NM like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or PATNT_NO like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by PATNT_NO desc

select PATNT_NO, PATNT_NM, PATNT_RRNO1, PATNT_AGE, PATNT_TELNO from patient where 1 = 1 and PATNT_HSPTLZ_AT = 'Y'
AND PATNT_NM like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or PATNT_NO like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by PATNT_NO desc
select PATNT_NO, PATNT_NM, PATNT_RRNO1, PATNT_AGE from patient where PATNT_HSPTLZ_AT = 'Y' order by PATNT_NO desc

select PATNT_NO, PATNT_NM, PATNT_RRNO1, PATNT_RRNO2, PATNT_TELNO, PATNT_ZIP, PATNT_ADRES1, PATNT_ADRES2, PATNT_AGE, PATNT_SEXDSTN, PRTCTOR_NM, PRTCTOR_TELNO, PATNT_AGRE, PATNT_HEIGHT, PATNT_BDWGH, PATNT_BDP, PATNT_HLTHINS_AT, PATNT_MEMO, PATNT_HSPTLZ_AT from patient where PATNT_NO = #{patntNo}

select PATNT_NO, PATNT_NM, PATNT_RRNO1, PATNT_RRNO2, PATNT_TELNO, PATNT_ZIP, PATNT_ADRES1, PATNT_ADRES2, PATNT_AGE, PATNT_SEXDSTN, PRTCTOR_NM, PRTCTOR_TELNO, PATNT_AGRE, PATNT_HEIGHT, PATNT_BDWGH, PATNT_BDP, PATNT_HLTHINS_AT, PATNT_MEMO, PATNT_HSPTLZ_AT from patient where PATNT_NO = #{patntNo}
mapper.update: update patient set PATNT_NM = #{patntNm}, PATNT_RRNO1 = #{patntRrno1}, PATNT_RRNO2 = #{patntRrno2}, PATNT_TELNO = #{patntTelno}, PATNT_ZIP = #{patntZip}, PATNT_ADRES1 = #{patntAdres1}, PATNT_ADRES2 = #{patntAdres2}, PATNT_AGE = #{patntAge}, PATNT_SEXDSTN = #{patntSexdstn}, PRTCTOR_NM = #{prtctorNm}, PRTCTOR_TELNO = #{prtctorTelno}, PATNT_AGRE = #{patntAgre}, PATNT_HEIGHT = #{patntHeight}, PATNT_BDWGH = #{patntBdwgh}, PATNT_BDP = #{patntBdp}, PATNT_HLTHINS_AT = #{patntHlthinsAt}, PATNT_MEMO = #{patntMemo} where PATNT_NO = #{patntNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.PATNT_NO, c.EMP_NO, e.EMP_NM, e.EMP_DOCTR_LCNS_NO, h.HSPTLZ_DE, h.REAL_LHSTL, p.PATNT_NM, p.PATNT_RRNO1, p.PATNT_RRNO2, p.PATNT_TELNO, p.PATNT_ZIP, p.PATNT_ADRES1, p.PATNT_ADRES2, p.PATNT_AGE, p.PATNT_SEXDSTN, p.PRTCTOR_NM, p.PRTCTOR_TELNO, p.PATNT_AGRE, p.PATNT_HEIGHT, p.PATNT_BDWGH, p.PATNT_BDP, p.PATNT_HLTHINS_AT, p.PATNT_MEMO, p.PATNT_HSPTLZ_AT FROM CLINIC c LEFT join PATIENT p on c.PATNT_NO = p.PATNT_NO LEFT join EMPLOYEE e on c.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT join HOSPITALIZATION h on c.CLNIC_NO = h.CLNIC_NO where c.CLNIC_NO = #{clnicNo}

select prscrptn_cd, po.medcin_cd, prscrptn_nm, medcin_pc, mdctn_cpcty, mdctn_unit, mdctn_co, mdctn_pd, medcin_standard, medcin_unit from prescription_order po, medicine m where po.medcin_cd = m.medcin_cd and clnic_no = #{clnicNo}
